DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : To investigate prevalence germline mutation BRCA 1/2 mismatch repair gene patient epithelial ovarian cancer ( EOC ) relatives , relate somatic mutation tumor tissue northern part china . Patients method : A multicenter prospective study hold northern part china form 2017 . About 1000 female patient epithelial ovarian cancer ralatives test germline mutation BRCA 1/2 mismatch repair gene relate somatic mutation tumor tissue , regardless family history . Study type : Observational Official title : Prevalence study germline mutation susceptibility ovarian cancer gene patient epithelial ovarian cancer somatic mutation tumor tissures northern part china . DOC.brief_title: Inherited Susceptible Genes Among Epithelial Ovarian Cancer
DOC.criteria: 1. epithelial ovarian cancer relatves 2. live north Huaihe River China 3. Han Chinese 1. nonepithelial ovarian cancer 2. without specific pathological diagnosis 3. nonHan Chinese
